headline: Assessing Broadcom Stock After 50% Rally and Industry Partnership Buzz
summary: Trying to decide what to do with Broadcom stock right now? You’re definitely not alone. This is a company that has powered through the tech landscape, catching the attention of both seasoned investors and those just starting out. With Broadcom’s shares closing at $349.24 and notching up a 50.5% gain just this year, not to mention a 699% increase over three years, it’s easy to see why people are watching closely for the next move. Over the past week and month, the stock has tacked on another...

headline: Has Sam Altman Made OpenAI Too Big to Fail?
summary: $650 billion That's how much OpenAI, under Chief Executive Sam Altman, has signed up to pay Nvidia and Oracle in the years ahead. Its prospective outlay could be closer to $1 trillion if deals with AMD, Broadcom, and other cloud providers like Microsoft are included.
